website_summaries.verdict: A simple, proven treatment to combat hair loss and encourage new hair growth.
pros: Once-daily treatment that's easy to use
Doesn't leave residue in your hair
Stops hair loss and makes hair fuller with regular use
cons: Though it works, it takes a while for some to start to see results

customer_reviews.title: So far so good at six months
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply. I used it up slightly faster than 2 months per bottle. It’s slow going so be patient. It says most people will see results starting at six months so I didn’t do post-pictures until then. Glad i waited because I can really see my widow’s peaks filling in! Supposedly the hair continues to fill in and thicken up for months to come. I’m keeping it up for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Regan D. Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: It really works! Today is November 19th and I started using this product in mid August
customer_reviews.author: Devastating Dee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good results! Update 05-13-2018: See the picture (using 5 months)
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: It just doesn't work for some women
customer_reviews.text: I was one of the unlucky few for whom Rogaine has no effect. I kept using it every day for 6 months, but nothing happened. It doesn't mean Rogaine is no good -- it means it doesn't grow hair for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Works but can worsen facial and body hair problems
customer_reviews.text: Despite being messy to apply, it definitely worked. After 4 months I see definite signs of hair regrowth. However it made my already problematic hirsutism worse! A lot of women have thinning hair on the head due to PCOS which unfortunately increases facial and body hair. If you have this issue, please be aware! I have decided to continue using Rogaine and try to remove unwanted hair by different methods. Another minor issue is that the foam is hard to apply if hair is long - more gets on hair than in scalp. A liquid application with a dropper would have been more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs Roy

customer_reviews.title: ... a year and ordering from Amazon and have had good results. The current order has a much more ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over a year and ordering from Amazon and have had good results. The current order has a much more watery consistency than past orders and my hair has been falling out at a faster rate. I believe this current order is defective but it is too late to return. Please be aware that the product should have the consistency of shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Darby

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware--Rogaine for Women it has propane, butane and alcohol in it.
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews before I bought it and didn't see any mention of the ingredients containing propane, butane and alcohol. When I received the product and saw the ingredients I was flabbergasted. It just doesn't seem like a good idea to put butane and propane on your scalp. They said for safety reasons they couldn't take it back. Since it is highly flammable. I contacted customer service and they were very helpful and courteous. They told me to dispose of it and they will refund me since there were no warnings about the contents. I replied that I will use it to start my grill or something. But it's not going on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Pk

customer_reviews.title: This product cannot be use for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 1 star as this product is great for people that can use it, but it fails to tell you upfront when ordering that only people that have hereditary hair loss can use this effectively. It won't help if there are other reasons such as iron deficiency or hypothyroidism and It says in the instructions that if have these, not to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy With the results! This is a before and after about six months.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Improved
customer_reviews.text: I can say that I am seeing a definite improvement in my hair growth. My only worry is the side effects. I am not experiencing any, but I am only 35 and if I have to use this the rest of my life... The photos were taken six months apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More Hair ... YAY!
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully! I gained twice as much hair ... more than I expected! It does not irritate my scalp and it's not greasy. Easy to use and only need once a day. Using more will not improve the outcome. I hope others who choose to use this product have the terrific results I have had. I am so pleased! Also, I saw new growth within 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: socalgal

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a foam that does NOT easily rub into you scalp- it gets "caught in one's hair" and takes a lot of effort to get to the scalp (I have longish hair). Much prefer the liquid which acts the same and is quickly and easily applied with a squeeze bottle or dropper. I would not buy this again and may not stick with it long enough to use it up. Also, leaves hair dirty feeling so I have to wash my hair more often.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Fox

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works
customer_reviews.text: It took only a few weeks to start noticing a difference, but it really does work although I did have a lot of shedding in the first two weeks of use. I'm 49, take supplements as well but that did nothing. Hormones are not yet at menopause levels. I was lazy around end of Nov/beg of December and reduced to putting it in 2x per week, by mid-January I started to have a shedding so immediately started back almost daily. If this is what it takes to keep the hair and follicles thriving, I'll use it for life. Why not? Better than a thin, ageing head of hair as a woman.
customer_reviews.author: D. St-Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Only used for a month
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews that it takes months before you see growth, so I'm not surprised I see nothing happening after a month. However my issue is the routine of it all, it's just not for me. The stuff my your hair look and feel gross, so sure you put it on at bed time and wash your hair in the morning, no big deal right? Well I was use to only washing my hair every other day so the washing every is annoying, plus sometimes when I have a late night I'll forget to put it in my hair and then worry what one day missed will do? I just don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product contains both propane and butane. I don’t want that on my scalp!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi R.

customer_reviews.title: This worked a miracle on my hair!!
customer_reviews.text: This has changed my life! I haven't had such thick hair in a very long time. I have medical issues that severely thinned my hair. You could see my scalp everywhere even if I teased my hair. It was so embarrassing. Now I have a full head of hair!!! I started using it in November and all the new growth is at least 2 inches. Another thing I've noticed it helps with is breakage. I'm not losing hardly any hair anymore. My pillow isn't covered. I put it all over my scalp because the thinness was everywhere. I will never stop using this product, at least until I get old enough to not care.
customer_reviews.author: Aries

customer_reviews.title: Serious Side Effects
customer_reviews.text: I used Rogaine for four days as directed. My lips and face became swollen and my doctor had to send a prescription to the drug store. When I checked the side effects on line swelling of the lips and face were listed along with the tongue and throat. If these symptoms occur the advice is to seek emergency medical care. Rogaine is not returnable and cost me $42.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: The foam is awful, wasteful and in the end...USELESS!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this stuff really works because the foam is a joke. You're supposed to get this on your scalp, so a liquid would be a much better delivery system. You end up getting this foam all over the rest of your hair before it gets to your scalp and is totally wasteful and useless. I find it's also drying my hair out. Since I have it, I may try using it again once the weather gets warmer and it isn't so dry out, but I still think the foam is a ridiculous method to apply to a scalp.
customer_reviews.author: EMac69

customer_reviews.title: Inferior to their liquid product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Rogaine for several years to treat alopecia. I've always used their original liquid formulation, at 3% strength. When ordering it on Amazon, I saw the newer foam version, 5% strength. And I thought I'd give it a go. I can't stand it. The foam is difficult to apply, and you have to use your fingers! I don't think it's working as well, and I assume that's because I'm not getting it where it needs to go. I still have a bunch of it left, and even though it's terribly expensive, I'm not sure I'll finish it. I'm going back to the liquid version!
customer_reviews.author: Clair L. Melton

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pain to have to do it every day but it doesn’t take long to apply. I haven’t had any side affects and never noticed any additional hair loss when I first start. My hair isn’t quite back to normal but this progression was from month 1 to month 2. A month and it has significantly improved! My hair does grow pretty quickly normally but I didn’t think it would work that quickly. Now I’m two months in a haven’t noticed as much change along the sides of my head but clearly is is helping.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin C.

customer_reviews.title: Rogaine foam gave me a bald spot AND acne
customer_reviews.text: I suggest that you try this foam out on your scalp in a inconspicuous area before using it above your forehead, or edges above your temples where the baby hairs are. It made my hair fall out, and I broke out in terrible acne. Does not work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The top two pics were day one and the bottom two reflect four months of use. I have missed days here and there but overall I see great results already! It looks like my part is starting to fill in more and I notice a lot of new growth. I look forward to seeing how things progress with continued use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In week 4 and my hair is falling out like crazy. I'm freaking out!
customer_reviews.text: Initial review... I haven't been using this long enough to give accurate info on how well it works, BUT I will say this...I'm horrified at the amount of hair that is falling out now (in week 4)...I am really freaking out and am reading by many reports, that this is normal. I can't afford to lose much more...it's coming out in finger-fulls. I hope it grows back. I am hoping to be back with a positive update in next handful of months
customer_reviews.author: THanby

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I started using this over a year ago. I used it every day for 6 months and didn't notice a difference. My hairdresser did not notice a difference, either. So I stopped. A month or so later, bunches of hair fell out! So I started up again and have been using for another 6 months. The difference is not really noticeable, but my hair stopped falling out. I guess I will always have to use Rogaine, but it's better than the alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Noel R

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and smells like alcohol
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen results yet in 2 weeks which I expected. It product is sticky at night and has a rubbing alcohol scent....I'll keep using it thigh for another 2 months to give it a real shot and will follow up with a final review.
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Michelle Bueno

customer_reviews.title: Works from hair breakage, stress related hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I didnt buy this for cronic/genetic hair loss. I bought it to regrow hair that I lost due to stress and breakage from being too dry. This stuff does work. I'm 30 and I wasn't sure if I was losing hair from genetic hair loss or stress from my job. Either way I've used this two months and my widows peak is fuller (dry ccurly hair that breaks easily) and a bald spot seems slightly less noticeable. I know this works bc I started growing hair near my hair line where the product drips a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin crawl
customer_reviews.text: After applying this stuff, I felt like the skin was crawling on my scalp! YUCK. Gave it to my sister.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn2222

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this stuff really works! I had some thinning all along my hairline and I’ve been using minoxil for a year now and my hair is much thicker and I can see a big difference! My eyelashes have been thicker and longer too, nice!! Just be careful because if you use too much you’ll get unwanted face hair, I had to cut down a bit because of the doubling in peach fuzz on my face. I have blonde hair but still can see in the right light. I always use after all my serums and moisturizers as to be sure not to accidentally get some on my face. I’m very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Review4u

customer_reviews.title: Not enough product
customer_reviews.text: I’m done with 1 bottle that’s suppose to be a month supply and it hasn’t been a month. I only use it on the front section of my hair. I’m not sure if this was meant for one section of your hair but I feel it’s not enough product for it to be a month supply per bottle. I’ve noticed my hair looks a little better but nothing major. Hopefully I’ll be able to see some actual results by the time I’m done with the second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Product works; application process is a big pain
customer_reviews.text: It does work. Hair regrows. The foam application is messy, a pain, and difficult. I have zero clue why they don’t have a dropper for the women’s 5% version. With the 2% the solution goes straight from bottle to scalp...no messing with foam on hair, running fingers in cold water, washing a non-porous dish every day, etc. I’m gonna switch back to the 2%. You have to do it 2x a day, but it’s still faster than this stupidity.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: 4 months my butt
customer_reviews.text: The product seems okay, not sure if it's working yet, HOWEVER, my reason for the review is that I paid almost 50$ for a "4 month supply" and it felt worth it for 13ish $ a month. But I've been using it for about 3 weeks and the first can might last me to the end of the month. There's no possible way to get even half of my scalp with the amount they recommend and that's with multiple hair parts and a PROCESS to get it worked as close to my scalp as possible, for sure I'm going with Kirkland's liquid rogaine after this runs out
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Been working for me for 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 18 months. Works well for me and I only use it every other day, when I wash my hair. It also gives a little boost in volume. I will say it does have a negative reaction with my hair color - the blonde highlights start getting brassy sooner than before. Doesn’t keep me from using it though. I used knock off brand and men’s Rogaine prior to being able to buy this and this is superior IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was one of the few this worked the opposite on! My hair got thinner as I used it. To bad because I was really counting on it!!
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with hair thinning on top of my head, although it does work I do not believe the side effects are worth it. When I was using Rogaine, I experienced a rapid heart beat and raised blood pressure. I could feel the pressure rising in my ears! It was awful! If you are sensitive to such side effects, please do not purchase. Thicker or longer hair is not worth your well-being. PS: The hair that began to grow in, indeed did fall out when I stopped using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mwoods

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this (inconsistently) and it works! NO QUESTION my hair is thicker on the crown and temples and FAR less hair comes out when I wash it and I only wash my (long) hair every 3 to 4 days. I need to use it every day, as the directions say, but even using it 3 to 4 times a week has made a big difference. I have been using it for about 6 months now and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: aweful
customer_reviews.text: just awful. made my hair a sticky mess. which caused more fall out.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: Made a life changing difference. Hair loss stopped, grew 40% more hair over 8 months and makes hair 20% thicker immediately when blow drying. AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: I Am In My Second Month
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second round of this product. It didn't last me four months, as far as I can see no hair has started to grow in. But I will stick with it for four months, to see if it works. The amount of product in "4 months of product" lasted me about a month. So plan of buying a lot. I couldn't manage the half a capful of product.
customer_reviews.author: MEM

customer_reviews.title: I think it MIGHT be slowing down the hair loss....
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this product and I've been using it for over a year now. However, the only reason I continue to use it is because I have definitely noticed my hair loss is much, much less which, of course, is a positive. However, I haven't not noticed ANY new hair growth whatsoever, hence the value for the money only being 2 stars. This product is touted as being able to REGROW women's hair and that has in now way been my experience.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I see an improvement in my hair. I see very small hair growing, such that I see a difference maybe not others. But if I keep up will definitely see a greater effect. I have been dealing with androgenetic alopecia for the past 8 years and I recently started using this. Though I haven't been consistent and it's bad but for the time that I have used it, it has definitely shown results. Keep it away from forehead, ears and the nape bc you will start seeing baby hair or peach fuzz.
customer_reviews.author: Tamanna

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn;t seem to work. The problem is also that in the morning, your hair is basically a wreck from having to apply the foam the night before. Foam isn't ideal to get to the scalp...it gets into your hair, and is difficult to control because it's, well.....foam.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I’m pretty bad about being 100% consistent with its use, but I’ve stilled noticed more hair growth. My widows peak is noticeably fuller after a few months. If I could remember to use it everyday, I’m sure I would be even more thrilled! It’s worth the price and it’s easy to use. Does not leave your hair/head feeling sticky or anything. The foam dissolves well with no residue or smell. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: ... caused my scalp to burn and I got a terrible headache. I do not wish to take a ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I could not continue using it after only one application because it caused my scalp to burn and I got a terrible headache. I do not wish to take a chance again! I wish I could get my money back! I wasted $32 dollars and have one unopened can and the one with only one application used. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cabinfolk

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had taken a before picture to share. I came in skeptical because I didn't want to get my hopes up that this product would work. Based on previous reviews, it doesn't appear to work for everybody. I'm elated to report that I've seen an uptake in tiny hairs growing in the last few months and my part is closing in. I hope it works for you as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, but requires time and commitment to see results.
customer_reviews.text: Because the photos helped when I decided a year ago to start using this, I thought I'd share mine. L-R is 12 months ago, 5 months in, and today. At the start, prepare to see lots of hair shedding (this is heart breaking) but it does eventually grow in. I wish it was a spray rather than a foam to apply and rub in, at the end of long days I'm sometimes tempted to skip it. You'll likely want to wash your hair everyday, sections where you applied it will feel dirty. Overall I'm happy it's somewhat improving my hereditary hair loss, but I wish it was easier to apply and my hair didn't feel dirty.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Hair lost control work great
customer_reviews.text: I started to use rogaine a few months ago, to be honest at first I was sure it wasn’t working but at the third month I started noticing my hair was thick and I wasn’t loosing that much hair as before, even when I was applying heat so yes I would totally recommended just be patience and give it a try for two or three months to be sure of your results, it’s super easy to apply, not painful at all, smell strong but not bad. 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Elinel Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Use
customer_reviews.text: My hair was extremely thick and is now falling out. The instructions say to put it directly on the scalp and not the hair. But, I am having a really hard time getting it to the scalp, without soaking the hair above. I think it would probably be easier when treating larger spots, instead of intermittent loss. If I had purchased from a store, I would return it and get the liquid. But I'll keep using it anyway. I want ,y hair thickness back.
customer_reviews.author: ru1384

customer_reviews.title: THE PRODUCT ADVERTISES HAIR GROWTH NOT LOSE HAIR FIRST
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that upon reading the insert of the product description of treatment indicates increase hair loss initially. Which is entirely the opposite of my mission to regrow my hair. Ridiculous to think that I want to loss old hair to grow new hair. I am not willing to risk that and go bald in areas that are not already. I TRULY BELIEVE THAT IF I CAN'T RETURN THE PRODUCT I SHOULD GET MY MONEY BACK . I am a senior citizen and can use my money. PLEASE
customer_reviews.author: DIANE ALDRICH

customer_reviews.title: Rogaine works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Rogaine for well over a year, and my hair dresser is stunned at the difference. I use Nioxin conditioner every night, then apply Rogaine. I wash my hair in the morning with Nioxin shampoo and conditioner, then style as usual. I also stepped it up with stem cell therapy to regrow fine hair. It did take around 5 months to see any difference, as hair does not regrow overnight. Don’t give up.
customer_reviews.author: Quack

customer_reviews.title: Be Patient - Results May Take A While
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since the end of January, over six months, and am just now seeing a difference in my hair thickness. I think that it is working, and have ordered another two canisters.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Questionable ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This product has propane and butane in it and severely irritated my scalp. I received the item on 4/6/2020. I used this product on 4/7/2020 and my scalp started shedding hair, blistering and scaling. My hair scalp was so itchy, I had to out hydrocortisone on it. This was a waste of my money and time and unfortunately since this item is flammable, it cannot be returned. Waste of money and my scalp is worse off than before.
customer_reviews.author: JoelleAlana

customer_reviews.title: side effect with product
customer_reviews.text: had a severe reaction of acne starting approximately 5 days after commencing use. I used the product for 5 weeks, not realizing it could be the Rogaine. within 4 days of stopping Rogaine, the acne went away and has not come back. I never read about this as a possible side effect, and I rarely have skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: ds

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I have some traction alopecia on the sides of my forehead from wearing my hair up so much for so many years. This stuff really works! It took about 1-2 months but my fiance noticed a change and my mom could even tell via facetime! Don't be embarrassed because it's rogaine... it's good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M

customer_reviews.title: it almost acts like a mousse and seems to volumize the area where ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Rogaine since I was 24 for my superfine and hormonally thin hair. I'm 32 now and I still use it daily to maintain my regrowth. Overall Rogaine helps you grow soft, downy hair that really helps to cover exposed scalp in conjunction with what you already have to work with. When you apply it, it almost acts like a mousse and seems to volumize the area where it's applied. This is true of both the droplet form but a little more so with the aerosol I've noticed. If you're considering trying it because you're burned out on trying to get your hair even acceptable looking then I recommend it. At this point I'm a lifer.
customer_reviews.author: Danicka Hildreth

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a bold spot
customer_reviews.text: Not for everyone. After just three uses gave me a bold spot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey and Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Hereditary hair loss is no fun (especially for women) and I was heartbroken when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Hereditary hair loss is no fun (especially for women) and I was heartbroken when I found out I had it years ago. It is incredibly common though! You just don't notice it so much on other ladies, because it's actually not so terrible to handle. Rogaine is fantastic for re-growing hair and also keeping the strands you still have ;) I've been using the twice daily liquid solution for years, but this foam is much better and gentler on the scalp too. I put it on in the evening, so only my hubby gets to enjoy the greasy look - no fussing around with Rogaine in the mornings any more!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: It is not enough and you have to use it like forever
customer_reviews.text: i have used this product for my hair regrowth. It is kid of helpful but definitely not enough. I ave to used other products and pills. The problem with this product is that I have to used it always because when I stop using after a year, all of its benefits disappear again. besides I used this product before my sleep, and I have to wash my hair in morning because using this product makes my hair dirty.
customer_reviews.author: t.aliakbari

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by how well this worked. Been using for about 18 months and I've experienced thicker hair and regrowth in sparse areas on my head. Took over a year to really notice a change. I'm no longer embarassed or self conscious about my thinning hair.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A Scheck

customer_reviews.title: it works. it grows facial+baby hair
customer_reviews.text: i was going to get a hair transplant before using this product. i was skeptical but it WORKED!!!! it doesnt grow actual hair but it does grow baby hair longer and it grows facial hair on my temples n forehead which is just as good. it literally saved me $9000 for hair transplant. but you have to use it everyday! at the same time of the day or night.
customer_reviews.author: linh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Beware of new facial hair
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little more than a month. My hair doesn’t as much which is great, if you do not mind a new wave of facial hair. To be honest, I don’t think it is worth it. This facial hair is so embarrassing! I’m going to finish the bottles before I decide if I should quit. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: K love the foam..not really a two month supply for whole head. I use it for top center thinning hair and to regrow missing center eyebrows from overplucking I know its not for brows but dabbed on with qtip and it worked Foam is great but hard to control but still love it
customer_reviews.author: tootiej

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description or poor dosage amounts
customer_reviews.text: Never used it before, so read instructions VERY carefully. Started daily use (1x at night) with very small amounts. It is now 3 weeks and container sputters like it will be out w/ one more use. This should be a 4 mo supply, but it appears to be less than 2.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: 4 months more like 2 months
customer_reviews.text: ok so I can't give a review on hair growth yet as I have only used for 1 month. there are 2 bottles inside. Each 2 month supply. I finished the 1st bottle and it's only been 1 month. So obviously the 4 month supply is based on if you want to do this on minimal spots. I used this pretty much on the front of my scalp from ear to ear. So the fact this stuff is so expensive to be used only for 2 months not even full head of hair I gave it 3 stars. I might update after using it awhile .
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: High sucess rate but it's not magic
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for help with thinning hair. It must be used every day; if you stop using it your hair will revert to it's "thin" state within 30 days. Using more than the daily recommended amount will not impact the product's performance. Product arrived quickly and perfectly packaged and is an excellent price for this amount of product.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Hair stopped falling out!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this is a day 2 review, I will Review this again later after more results have shown. I’ve got to say day to my hair has stopped falling out!! It’s not growing back yet it doesn’t look fuller, but it stopped falling out! I had a huge problem with hair coming out like clumps in the shower, if I ran my fingers through my hair I’d have like 50 hairs in my fingers. Was disgusting. But it stopped! Only on day 2.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C Grable

customer_reviews.title: Love Rogaine!
customer_reviews.text: Always used Target liquid,2%, just didn't do much anymore. I love Rogaine 5% for women. It's super easy to use and control. Only once a day. I am seeing results after a month,filling in the temple areas where I had the most thinning. I am so glad to have found this which comes with two cans that will last 4 months total. You must use consistently.
customer_reviews.author: The

customer_reviews.title: Packaging. I cannot figure out how to open the lid without using a hammer
customer_reviews.text: Packaging. I purchased this item because I know it works in stimulating my hair follicles to grow new hair and creating a thick mane of hair, but the packaging is so terrible, to-date, I have not been able to figure out how to open the lid without smashing it with a hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Viking Princess

customer_reviews.title: Too many chemicals that are absorbed
customer_reviews.text: Do your research first because Amazon won't let you return it even unopened. And I mean even with the delivery box itself unopened. I ordered it before I read about the chemicals from it that you absorb through your scalp. I decided it wasn't worth it. So, I can't really say if the product works or not...just that you can't return it once you have purchased it. Wish that was clearly stated, but why would they do that? Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable product.
customer_reviews.text: This product helps the hair grow back. I’m very pleased with the thickness I’ve received in 3 months. Only thing I do not like is, the product retains a blindfish color in my white/silver hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Good product indeed
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this for almost 2 months now and have indeed seen a noticeable difference (less thinning area and my hair is SOFTER where i apply it, total bonus!) It does state results can take anywhere from 2 to 4 months if i remember correctly. Good product indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Alana H.

customer_reviews.title: Ah, may be not for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for three weeks now however I am not quite sure if it is helping me in hair growth. I think it may help in hair regrowth with continuous use for couple of months. But I am planning to return as it is causing burns to the eyes sometimes. Pros- Easy to apply as it is foam based Dries quickly Sufficient quantity for four months Easy to use packaging Cons: makes your eyes burn Description says that it helps only for the top scalp hair thinning so if you are looking for overall hair growth this product may not be useful for you.
customer_reviews.author: Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Great price for 2
customer_reviews.text: I am a regular user of this product and probably will be the rest of my life it’s in my jeans to have thin hair with this product is definitely helped I don’t see my scalp as much as I did before using the product this is my third time purchasing it I will be be forever grateful for this product very easy to use it’s a staple in my nightly routine The one bottle does not last me for two months still worth it
customer_reviews.author: Adreanna Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had never used it!
customer_reviews.text: My hair was thinning with age and I decided to try Minoxidil. I used it on both temples for about three months. Absolutely no effect on my right side but I lost hair on my left side and the little bit of hair that did grow back was damaged. Dry, thin and frizzy. It's still that way seven months later. I wish I had never used it but I'm so glad that I didn't try it on the rest of my head!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlini

customer_reviews.title: 2nd bottle of a 2 pack did not dispense!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pack in a 2 bottle "deal". The 1st bottle worked fine. But the 2nd bottle did not dispense as a foam. It leaked out a liquid formula that was un-useable. I shook it up but it just doesn't work! Unfortunately, before I was into the 2nd bottle, the return window had passed, so I couldn't even return the part that was bad. To make it worse it was a subscribe and save item. Not sure if I should cancel subscription, or not. I like the product, it does seem to be working. But it is expensive and I have a bottle that is wasted. Any feedback or suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E.

customer_reviews.title: It Works for Me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a year. I do not use it every day, but it has resulted in more hair (although they are kinky, weird hairs) on the top of my head and makes my hair feel and look thicker. This will not work for everyone, but luckily, it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Costello

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a few months. I totally see a difference. There’s new hair growth. I use a little bit of it on my eyebrows too!
customer_reviews.author: Samir & Lopa Kapur

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I like it, use it y days a week. I think that it has done some good and I have more hair in some areas, in others I don't know if it's possible to se regrowth. I don't see near as much hair on my brush. I believe it's helping, I'll continue to use it. The only down side to this is that it makes my hair stiff, so I use it just before bed and always have to wash my hair in the am to style.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Girl

customer_reviews.title: did not work for me so after 6 months I ...
customer_reviews.text: did not work for me so after 6 months I gave up and still have not found anything to help my thinning hair.
customer_reviews.author: WAB

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for 6 months and notice medium new growth. It takes time for new growth to appear and you must apply it everyday. The hair growth gets better the longer it is used.
customer_reviews.author: ADB

customer_reviews.title: Works if you use it every day for the rest of your life.
customer_reviews.text: Small price to pay to have hair for a woman. It’s effective. But you have to be consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Tamatha Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I received this product sometime after I had gotten home. I was not aware of a delivery last night but when I went out this morning the package was there. I waited a bit for it to warm up but it is coming out clumpy and liquidy ! I spent a lot of money on this and can't even use it!! When I tried contacting amazon for a product problem I can't get anywhere! If you live in a area where the temp is snowy and cold don't buy wait till warmer weather. I won't buy again after loosing over $40's
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Women pay more than men for same product
customer_reviews.text: I use the product and get good results but ..... Why does the women’s Rogaine foam cost more than the men’s? The women pay $43.12 for 2 cans and the men pay $45.97 for 3 cans. Same product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chisholm

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually skeptical about buying it. After trying so many other topical serums I wanted to give it a go. It’s been 3 weeks and I’m seeing baby hairs and finally my edges are coming back. Only thing I’m worried is what if my hair starts to fall out once I stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Shayma H.

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: I love ❤️ the fact you can actually put this foam hair product on your hair and an still style your hair. It is a foam that turns into a liquid so you can easily rub it on your scalp where your hair is thinning. This is my first order but I feel it will help my thin spots fill in with hair so I will order again !
customer_reviews.author: BBWWATTS

customer_reviews.title: I feel and look so much better. This is so worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My hair had thinned considerably for years...I have been to doctors and was told nothing to do about it. I purchased this product and 3 months later i am enjoying my new look. I feel and look so much better. This is so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually works in about 4 weeks I saw a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Torres

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I was losing my hair because of new medication. I talked to my doctor about my concern. She recommended this product. That I started using last May 2018. My hair I'd thick and back to normal. Love this product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Eduardos

customer_reviews.title: I love the stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but I am in to my fourth month of using it and I can no longer see my scalp through my hair. I also was out in the sun all day and did not get sunburn on my head which I had done the last time I was out without a hat. I have to wear hats because of my eyes but I prefer to wear visors and now I can again, and my head is so much cooler. I wish my Mother would have had access to Rogain when she was alive since she was almost bald. I love the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Talitha Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Thicker hair on 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed a difference In the crown area. I had been taking it for 4 months before I noticed a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Usher

customer_reviews.title: best price and really helps my alopecia
customer_reviews.text: best price and really helps my alopecia !!! thank you, I don't mind that I need to use it forever to maintain my results, we all use products in our hair every day so it's not a big deal to add one more thing to the routine. It has really helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this, so am not commenting on the outcome for me. I do love how it is easy to use, dried nicely and doesn't make my hair look dirty or greasy. I just use it on my balding areas, right on the scalp with my fingers and when it dries, you can't even tell it's there. I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Shdonna

customer_reviews.title: Made my wife’s scalp hurt to an unbearable degree
customer_reviews.text: She made it about two weeks before throwing a four month supply away. Apparently it made her scalp ache the whole time. She does have sensitive skin, but also a high pain tolerance, so I’m not sure what was going on.
customer_reviews.author: BoomS

customer_reviews.title: I am happy to report that
customer_reviews.text: As a hairstylist, I feel compelled to write a review for Rogaine. I have struggled with a very (noticeably) thin hairline since I was 27. Now, 5 years later, I'm giving Rogaine a try. I am happy to report that, after 4 months of use, I am seeing significant hair growth where I have been applying it. First, after 1.5 months, I noticed patches of tiny 1/2 inch long hairs starting to grow in in the recession area of my hairline. Now at 4 months, the new growth is almost 2 inches long. In all honesty, when it comes to hair loss, there is no magical cure out there...but Rogaine is a step in the right direction.
customer_reviews.author: K. Klein

customer_reviews.title: This product is allowing my aging process to slow down ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is allowing my aging process to slow down in terms of my hair density. I have new growth from steady use and feel much more confident with my appearance. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: It may not work
customer_reviews.text: I tried to return this product before it was delivered because I read that I will most likely not work for people over 40, but they sent it anyway. I tried using it and it made my scalp dry so I had increased hair fall out. I wish to return it but after they've sent it anyway, they have a no return once you've received it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Keesee

customer_reviews.title: Hazardous to Your Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these types of products from Amazon. You can't return them to Amazon if they don't work because of the type of material they are. They can ship them to you though. I know this product works for some people but I actually lost hair with it, now I'm stuck with $40 of product that is useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: It is doing its job
customer_reviews.text: I have already repurchased this 2 times. Baby hair is growing out, need to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING I HAVE NEW HAIR NOW
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A GREAT PRODUCT. I HAVE TRIED EVERYTHING POSSIBLE TO GROW NEW HAIR BECAUSE MINE WAS DISAPPEARING FASTED THAN IT WAS GROWING. I HAD ZERO SUCCESS UNTIL I TRIED ROGAINE. I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PRODUCT FOR APPROXIMATELY ONE MONTH AND HAVE LOTS OF NEW HAIR. THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA MCGOWAN

customer_reviews.title: Probably best if you have dry coarse hair?
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and pretty direct. I’ve been using it as instructed daily and haven’t really Seen a difference. It’s really oily and leaves your hair feeling gross. Despite that I still kept on and have seen no changes. So I just started another product for 3 weeks and it’s totally better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: 1 can lasts over 2 months for 3 spots. I definitely see my thinning hair filling in to where my scalp is covered. Regrown hair is fine and only an inch or so long but fills in the scalp and looks much better. I’m going to keep using it. It’s taken 2 months to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Mitchell

product_meta.title: Women's Rogaine 5% Minoxidil Foam for Hair Thinning and Loss, Topical Treatment for Women’s Hair Regrowth, 4-Month Supply
product_meta.description: Style Name:Women's Rogaine 5% 4 monthHelp treat hair loss and regrow fuller hair with Women's Rogaine 5% Minoxidil Topical Foam. Ideal for use at the early stages of hair thinning, this fast-working hair regrowth treatment is specially formulated for women and is clinically proven to regrow up to 25% more hair. This thinning hair foam penetrates the scalp to reactivate shrunken hair follicles, allowing for regrowth of hair. The 5% Minoxidil formula works to boost hair follicle activity and hair protein production, while Tricho-Prime Technology uses a proprietary combination of ingredients to create an optimal environment for hair regrowth. The thinning hair treatment also contains botanical extracts and emollient to help maintain a healthy, conditioned scalp, plus alphahydroxy acid (AHA) to promote natural skin exfoliation to help keep follicles open. This hair growth treatment comes in a no-mess foam that is easy to use and is designed to fit easily into your daily beauty regimen with once-daily use.
feature_bullets: 4-month supply of Women's Rogaine 5% Minoxidil Foam hair growth treatment to help treat thinning hair, hair loss and regrow fuller hair

Specially formulated for women, this fast-working hair growth treatment is made with 5% Minoxidil and is clinically proven to regrow up to 25% more hair and works to boost hair follicle activity and hair protein production

Hair thinning treatment also contains botanical extracts and emollient to help maintain a healthy, conditioned scalp, plus alphahydroxy acid (AHA) to promote natural skin exfoliation to help keep hair follicles open

From the #1 dermatologist-recommended brand, this anti-hair loss foam is ideal for use at the early stages of hair thinning and features Tricho-Prime Technology that works on contact to create a healthy hair regrowth environment
Women's hair growth treatment delivers clinically visible results and comes in an easy-to-apply foam that is specially designed to fit easily into your daily beauty regimen

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
